txt.en: 'Perhaps it will do me some good to leave Angmar behind.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The cauldrons ahead are curiously unlit</rgb>
Corunir has ventured into Norbar. Follow him and speak with him about rescuing Golodir.
'These shadows have become too familiar. It will be best to leave them behind.'
Golodir has been driven mad by some force within Nûrz Ghâshu and must be subdued.

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Ruin with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Chaos in the Ranks!'\n<rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb> <rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb> <rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb> <rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A screech echoes from the south...Nurnor has awakened</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A mass of blades and fire rises from the lava.</rgb>

'We have done well to make it this far, [placeholder], but it seems that many of the evils that once dwelt here have retreated into the deepest depths of Nûrz Ghâshu. It may be too much to hope for our passage to remain unnoticed.

'What can have driven Golodir to make this dangerous journey? Has he lost all hope for the future? He has suffered so much, more than any one Man should, and yet he persevered. Has he at last given in to despair?

'We must keep moving. Norbar is ahead. I fear what we may find there.'

'He speaks of his daughter as if she still lived, [placeholder]...there is some great evil at work here.\n\n'What has raised this madness in the mind of my mentor, to cruelly seize upon the grief within his heart? And what can be done about it?'

'Look there, beyond the great pit of fire: it is Golodir! We have found him!\n\n'Let us make our way to the far side of Norbar, [placeholder]. There we will speak with Golodir and bring him from these perilous depths!'

'What has happened? Where...where am I? Who...who are all of you?'

Golodir looks around in amazement and confusion.

'There was a ringing in my ears, as if I swam in deep water...but it is gone now. There was something else....'
'Golodir! Why have you come to this place? Speak, my friend!'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Lach!'
'Lorniel! Stand back from the door! I have come to save you!'

'What has happened? Where...where am I?'

Golodir looks around in amazement and confusion.

'There was a ringing in my ears, as if I swam in deep water...but it is gone now. There was something else...'

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Lach with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>

'I shudder to think of what awaited Golodir beyond that door, [placeholder]. Erebún's dominance on the mind of my mentor was strong; what would Golodir have seen there had he remained under the Rogmul's power?

'I care not to guess. I know only that it would not have been Lorniel, and perhaps that would have been enough to destroy Golodir forever.

'Let us escape to the surface! Nûrz Ghâshu is no place for us, or for our loved ones!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Cefrog has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A faint heat radiates from this altar</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Narubras has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'This way! We will skirt the edge of the Coliseum. Beware the fire-streams!'
Torech Ruin must be cleared away before this door can be opened.
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Naur!'
<rgb=#00FF00>Corunir calls out, 'Excellent hit! Protect me while I find the next weak spot!'</rgb>
'Something is not right! Come here...we must unravel this mystery, or I fear he will be lost to us!'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Lach with Misdirection!'\n<rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb> <rgb=#ffff00>Guile</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Faint snoring comes from south</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Morfuin falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Our foe reveals himself! I will set traps of ice with which to overcome his powers!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Snagtalún falls to your mighty blow</rgb>

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Lach with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Planned Attack!'
'The Ranger's pain serves as a gateway for Erebún's will. I will not permit you to close it!'
Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Power in Numbers!' \n<rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb>
'This force has imposed its will upon Golodir! It poisons him against us!'
'A shroud has lifted from my eyes...but which is the dream, and which is not?'
Corunir is troubled by his friend's actions. Speak with him within Norbar
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Chaos in the Ranks!'

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Naur with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Naur with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Lúgryn falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
Erebún, an ancient Rogmul, has imposed its will upon Golodir's mind. If he is defeated, perhaps Golodir's grief-borne madness will dissipate.
Erebún has been defeated, and Golodir's mind is clear once more. You should speak now with him.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The stone pile in the corner appeared to move slightly</rgb>

Make your way to Norbar

<rgb=#FF0000>The denizens of Nûrz Ghâshu are coming to protect the ancient Torech!</rgb>
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Pounding Echos!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Gháshglob, screaming curses, enters from the path ahead</rgb>
'It will take me a few moments to set the trap!'
'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike at it!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Corunir calls out, 'Too slow! The weak spot has moved! Protect me while I attempt to find it again!'</rgb>
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Clash of Arms!'
An ancient fumerole, Torech Lach, has arisen and blocked your path!
<rgb=#00FF00>Torech Lach has been destroyed. The path forward is open.</rgb>

An ancient fumerole, Torech Ruin, has arisen and blocked your path!
<rgb=#00FF00>Torech Ruin has been destroyed. The doors to the Coliseum and Golodir are now open</rgb>
Golodir is across Norbar
Golodir has been pacified for now. The source of his madness will not be pleased
<rgb=#FF0000>Golodir has fallen</rgb>
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech!'

Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Hail of Blows!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
'No, Golodir, you are wrong!'
Erebún has been defeated and Golodir has been freed
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Snagtalún's angry roar echoes across the lava field</rgb>
'You are the bravest Ranger I know! Why else would Erebún seek to master your mind?'
Torech Lach
<rgb=#FF0000>Golodir has fallen</rgb>
'He sought to deprive us of you, and at a moment when we need you the most.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As flames roar across the altar, Gormalith screams at your intrusion</rgb>
Torech Naur
<rgb=#FF0000>Corunir has fallen</rgb>
'The Dúnedain are gathering. We must ride to the aid of our lord Aragorn. We need you, Golodir.'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Lach with Clash of Arms!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
Torech Ruin
<rgb=#FF0000>Golodir has fallen</rgb>
Norbar
'Time is wasting! I will destroy this one myself!'
'The way to Norbar is open! To Golodir!'
Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Noble Lineage!'\n<rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00FF00>Cry</rgb> <rgb=#00FF00>Cry</rgb>
'Get away from here! You think you can stop me? I will save her!'
'Golodir is not himself, of this I am certain.'
'He is the wisest Ranger I have known. What could have driven him to this place?'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gháshglob falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
'I cannot understand it. We must rescue him, even if it be from himself!'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Naur with Clash of Arms!'\n<rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Strength</rgb>
'What is this feeling? Can you not sense it? Darkness and power!'
Rescue in Nûrz Ghâshu

'The trap is set! Quickly, draw him towards it!'

Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Planned Attack!'\n<rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb> <rgb=#00ffff>Spirit</rgb>
Golodir has ventured deep within Nûrz Gâshu, and his close friend Corunir is desperate to save him.
'The pain... it is unbearable...'
<rgb=#FF0000>Corunir calls out, 'You missed! Protect me while I find to where the weakness has moved!'</rgb>
'Get away from here! I will rescue her!'
'Where am I? My mind feels as if it were filled with clouds...how did I come to be here?'
'Your strike was off the mark! Protect me while I search for another weakness!'

Golodir must survive
Listen to Corunir

'You were not fast enough, and we have lost the advantage! I must find it again!'
Talk to Golodir
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike Torech Ruin!'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Misdirection!'
Corunir is waiting to speak with you outside Norbar within the depths of Nûrz Ghâshu.
Golodir is within Norbar. You must reach him as quickly as possible.
Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Noble Lineage!'
Corunir calls out 'I have found its weakness! Quickly, strike the Torech with Hail of Blows!'
An ancient fumerole, Torech Lach, has erupted and is blocking your path forward. It must be dealt with so you can proceed.
'Make haste! We must breach Norbar before it is too late!'
'Lorniel was...she was alive! It was not too late to save her!'
Corunir calls out, 'Quickly, strike Golodir with Power in Numbers!'
Golodir is within Norbar. You must reach him with haste.
'Some part of me knew that Erebún had dominance over my mind...'
'...but even the small hope of seeing Lorniel again was hope enough. I did not fight him.'
An ancient fumerole, Torech Naur, has erupted and is blocking your path forward. It must be dealt with so you can proceed.
'I am ashamed. I am no Ranger.'
Golodir is within Norbar. You must reach him with haste.
'So the time has come at last.'
An ancient fumerole, Torech Ruin, has erupted and is blocking your path forward. It must be dealt with so you can proceed.
